title: Mutation
question: Chromosome mutation / Mutasi kromosom
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question: Gene mutation / Mutasi gen
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
an extra chromosome in chromosome number 21 / 
terdapat penambahan satu kromosom pada pasangan kromosom ke-21
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
physical and mental retardation, short neck, slanted eyes and short stocky body / 
kerencatan fizikal dan mental, leher pendek, mata sepet dan badan lebih rendah
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question: 44 + XO
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question: 44 + XXY
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
more number of sex chromosomes / 
lebih bilangan kromosom seks
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
unable to differentiate between red and green / 
tidak dapat membezakan antara warna merah dengan hijau
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
abnormal red blood cell shape that is sickle-shaped / 
mempunyai bentuk sel darah merah abnormal yang berbentuk sabit
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
has small red blood cells and the lifespan of the cells is shorter / 
mempunyai sel darah merah yang kecil dan jangka hayat sel ini lebih singkat
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question:
has difficulty in the clotting of his blood / 
mengalami kesukaran darah membeku
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question: no black pigment / tiada pigmen hitam
E: Sickle cell anaemia / Anemia sel sabit

question: Mutagen
F: Pregnancy at a late age / Kehamilan pada usia yang lewat
